channel.title: Hugs In The Air
channel.description: Hugs in the Air is a gentle podcast for anyone who needs a little company. It’s like listening to a long-distance friend who shows up, sits with you, and talks about life as it is — worries, quarter-life crises, movies, books, and the quiet thoughts we don’t always say out loud. You don’t have to be brave or strong here. Just listen, breathe, and feel less alone.
channel.itunes:author: La Wun
channel.itunes:summary: A soft, cozy podcast that feels like a long-distance friend talking about life, quarter-life struggles, movies, books, and the comfort of not being alone.
